data.message: Hi i need help ,, im admin in my grupe (1,803 members) a few days ago i change group privacy to secret,, now i cant change to closed or public because i dont have this options no more,, i thik is a bug ,,http://prntscr.com/5zakas

replies.message: Hi Tony. With groups containing 250 people or more, you can only change its privacy to a more restrictive setting, such as public to closed or closed to secret. We do this to protect members of these groups from having their posts shared with audiences they didn't intend. -Rose
yes i now but i dont have this options,, i have only secret?? and i have 1800 members http://prntscr.com/60bfyo
